page.title: 18Changes In Our Village
page.content: In 1984 a film on rural village self-help was shown at school by a field officer appointed by Cheshire Community Council.The following activities have resulted. 1. Coddington and District{Parish {Council}was formed this year,joint members being Aldersey,Barton,Carden, Chowley,Clutton,Coddington and Stretton. 2. Cheshire Community Council is pressing the Planning Authority to allow low cost{family housing}to keep the community alive. 3. A{lunch club}was formed where for Â£1 each up to 20 adults enjoy a weekly lunch at school. 4. A group has formed to bring together{mothers and children under 5. 5. A{gardening club}has been formed and has 34 members. 6.{Public Transport}was improved.
